0.author: Jeremy Taylor
0.body: Love is friendship set on fire

1.author: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun
1.body: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.

2.author: Samuel Butler
2.body: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all.

3.author: Walt Whitman
3.body: When I give I give myself.
